### Sign up for MyArlingtonTX News

Stay informed with this twice-weekly e-newsletter sent right to your inbox.

City Council Members
====================

[Mayor Jim Ross
--------------](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/City-Government/City-Council/City-Council-Members/Mayor-Jim-Ross)
Mayor

![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/city-council/images/mayor-jim-ross-horizontal.jpg?dimension=userprofile&w=150&h=150)

* Telephone[817-459-6122](tel:8174596122)
* ProfileFirst elected in 2021, Mayor Ross represents the City at Large.

[Mauricio Galante
----------------](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/City-Government/City-Council/City-Council-Members/Council-Member-Mauricio-Galante-District-1)
District 1 Council Member

![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/city-council/images/mauricio-galante-horizontal.jpg?dimension=userprofile&w=150&h=150)

* Telephone[817-459-6141](tel:8174596141)
* ProfileElected in May 2024, Council Member Galante represents District 1.

[Raul H. Gonzalez
----------------](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/City-Government/City-Council/City-Council-Members/Council-Member-Raul-H.-Gonzalez-District-2)
Council Member District 2

![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/city-council/images/raul-h-gonzalez-horizontal.jpg?dimension=userprofile&w=150&h=150)

* Telephone[817-459-6143](tel:8174596143)
* ProfileElected in November 2020, Council Member Gonzalez represents District 2. He is Deputy Mayor Pro-Tempore.

[Nikkie Hunter
-------------](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/City-Government/City-Council/City-Council-Members/Council-Member-Nikkie-Hunter-District-3)
Council Member District 3

![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/city-council/images/nikkie-hunter-horizontal.jpg?dimension=userprofile&w=150&h=150)

* Telephone[817-459-6141](tel:8174596141)
* ProfileElected in June 2021, Council Member Hunter represents District 3.

[Andrew Piel
-----------](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/City-Government/City-Council/City-Council-Members/Council-Member-Andrew-Piel-District-4)
Council Member District 4

![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/city-council/images/andrew-piel-horizontal.jpg?dimension=userprofile&w=150&h=150)

* Telephone[817-459-6141](tel:8174596141)
* ProfileElected in May 2019, Council Member Piel represents District 4.

[Rebecca Boxall
--------------](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/City-Government/City-Council/City-Council-Members/Council-Member-Rebecca-Boxall-District-5)
Council Member District 5

![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/city-council/images/rebecca-boxall-horizontal.jpg?dimension=userprofile&w=150&h=150)

* Telephone[817-459-6143](tel:8174596143)
* ProfileElected in May 2021, Council Member Boxall represents District 5.

[Long Pham
---------](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/Government/City-Government/City-Council/City-Council-Members/Council-Member-Long-Pham-District-6)
Council Member District 6

![](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/city-council/images/long-pham-horizontal.jpg?dimension=userprofile&w=150&h=150)

* Telephone[817-459-6143](tel:8174596143)
* ProfileFirst elected in June 2022, Council Member Pham represents At-Large District 6.
